linux.command: python3 -m venv night_venv && source night_venv/bin/activate && python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt && deactivate night_venv

osx.command: python3 -m venv night_venv && source night_venv/bin/activate && python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt && deactivate night_venv

windows.command: (if not exist night_venv py -m venv night_venv) && .\night_venv\Scripts\activate.bat && py -m pip install --upgrade pip && py -m pip install -r requirements.txt && deactivate night_venv
